title: Toncoin to Be at the Center of Telegram’s New Ad Monetization Strategy
description: Toncoin, a top 20 cryptocurrency project, will be used by Telegram, the messaging platform, as a payment tool for its new advertisement strategy. Pavel Durov, founder and CEO of Telegram, stated that toncoin would facilitate payments for customers of its advertising platform, announcing that it would share 50% of any profit from these ads with […]

title: UK Set to Empower Law Enforcement with Enhanced Crypto Seizure Capabilities
description: In a significant move to combat crime and terrorism financing, UK law enforcement agencies are on the brink of receiving augmented powers to seize cryptocurrency assets linked to criminal activities.  The development, set to be implemented on April 26, follows the recent approval of secondary legislation underpinning the Economic Crime and Corporate Transparency Act 2023. […]

title: Nvidia Surges Past $2 Trillion Mark Following Dell’s Upbeat Forecast
description: Nvidia Corporation has reached a historic milestone, crossing the $2 trillion market value threshold for the first time. The surge came from an optimistic report from Dell Technologies, which buoyed Wall Street’s enthusiasm for AI-related investments. Dell Technologies’ rosy outlook, particularly regarding the surge in orders for its AI-optimized servers, propelled Nvidia’s stock to a […]

title: SatoshiVM Ushers in a New Era with Alpha Mainnet Launch
description: SatoshiVM, a pioneering Bitcoin Layer2 project, has officially announced the launch date of its Alpha mainnet for March 15.  The highly anticipated launch is set to revolutionize the blockchain space by introducing a suite of advanced features designed to enhance user experience and expand the capabilities of the Bitcoin network. Innovations on the horizon The […]

title: SHIB Leapfrogs DOGE, PEPE, BONK, Soars 55% In 24 Hours
description:
SHIB’s flat price action broke out and flipped the minor resistance at $0.00001345. The 4-hour chart indicated that SHIB’s rise has not been stopped by any bearish candlestick. Bullish momentum and high volatility could fuel SHIB’s increase toward $0.000030. Shiba Inu (SHIB), the dog-themed meme coin skyrocketed by 55% in the last 24 hours, data […]
